result0.name: corrosion2
maintenanceDecision: PreventiveMaintenance: There are medium corrosion defects but can keep normal functions.

message: Based on the Network Rail Standard-Condition Marking of Bridges (NR/L3/CIV/006/2C), for corrosion2([8] mm and [64.52]%), its severity rating is ['D'], and its extent rating is [6].
The maintenance solution of corrosion2 is ['PreventiveMaintenance: There are medium corrosion defects but can keep normal functions.'].
